thread.section_title: Auto Europe US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Auto Europe US | autoeurope.com
thread.title: Cam
thread.title_full: Auto Europe US reviewed by Cam

author: Cam
title: Cam
text: I am a travel agent and just wanted to make sure Lance is commended as he went above and beyond for me when I called for a massive client issue who was in Europe. Car rental charges, local taxes, fees ect can be very confusing and he was very clear with explaining. He went above and beyond to resolve my clients issue calling multiple carriers to gather all the information needed in the mess. He was truly amazing and extremely helpful. A perfect example of amazing service. Thank you, Lance!
